settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings. Update your profile, change your password, and customize the app's appearance.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Select the theme for the dashboard.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your profile settings. Update your personal information and preferences.
profile.first_name_helper_text: Your first name as it appears in your profile.
profile.last_name_helper_text: Your last name as it appears in your profile.
profile.username_helper_text: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym. You can only change this once every 30 days.
profile.email_helper_text: Your email is managed by your authentication provider and cannot be changed here.
profile.profile_update_failed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
profile.password_section_description: Update your password to keep your account secure.
profile.password_prompt: Click the button below to change your password.
profile.new_password_helper_text: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
profile.reverification_required_description: For security reasons, please sign out and sign back in before changing your password.
profile.current_password_incorrect: Current password is incorrect. Please try again.
profile.password_compromised: This password has been compromised in a data breach. Please choose a different password.

hero.title: Focus On What Matters
hero.description: This Vue & Clerk custom auth component integration will save you hours of development time.

auth.sign_up_success_description: Welcome! Your account has been created.
auth.sign_out_success_description: You have been signed out of your account.
auth.verification_code_sent_description: Please check your email for the verification code.
auth.verification_code_resent_description: A new verification code has been sent to your email.

password_reset.code_sent_description: Password reset code has been sent to your email.
password_reset.code_resent_description: A new password reset code has been sent to your email.
password_reset.reset_success_description: Your password has been reset successfully. Redirecting...

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: View and manage your profile information.

billing.title: Billing
billing.description: Manage your subscription and billing information.
billing.current_plan_description: You are currently on this plan
billing.add_payment_method_description: Add a payment method to upgrade your plan
billing.billing_history_description: View your past invoices and payments
billing.no_invoices_description: Your billing history will appear here once you make a payment
